author: CTPPS
body:
Those new modules are available to start your review:
FastSimulation/PPSFastObjects
FastSimulation/PPSFastSim
FastSimulation/PPSValidation

More information are this twiki page: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/PPSFastSimulation 
Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_0_X #13173 (original by @CTPPSSimulation).
title: integration of the CT-PPS FastSim in CMSSW_8_0_X
